entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 07:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm over the Highlands. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
